text: The Kerala flood was a natural disaster that happened in Kerala, India in August 2018. This was because of high rainfall during the monsoon season. The floods were worst in August. It was the worst flood in Kerala in nearly a century. Over 483 people died, and 15 became missing. ==References== Category:2018 disasters in Asia Category:2010s floods Category:2010s disasters in India Category:August 2018 events Category:Floods in India 2018 floods Category:2018 in India
title: 2018 Kerala floods
